LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_TryAlwaysSpawnWi: Try to always spawn with holes
Will spawn nearly all blueprints as ruins with holes in their walls. \nHint: Exceptions are buildings containing enemies.
LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_HoleChancePercen: Chance per cell to generate a hole:
LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_HoleChanceOnWate: Chance per water-cell to generate a hole:
LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_UrbanCity_OnlyFo: For the Urban City Extension only:
This part is only active when you also have the extension for urban cities running.
LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_UrbanCity_SpawnC: Multiplicator for the urban city biome generation:
With this you can increase/reduce the chance to get an urban city biome when the map is generated.
